name: screenshot-fullpage-extension
description: Screenshot tool for making a full page or partial screen capture with further edit, download or text adding

scripts.dev: parcel watch src/popup/popup.html && parcel watch src/popup/popup.html && parcel watch src/worker/worker.js
scripts.cp: cp manifest.json dist && cp -r icons dist && cp -r LICENSE dist
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && npm run build:popup && npm run build:editor && npm run build:worker && npm run cp

author: Haikel Fazzani
